summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6089 for the improvement of 41st Avenue Southwest from West Thistle Street to approximately 217 feet south of West Cloverdale Street; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 83980, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
